entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 7:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -24.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -30.1°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
